summary:
Features:
Dan Bulls Epic Skyrim Rap Main Menu Replacer
The Wings of Icarus Dragon Battle Replacer
Two Steps From Hell - To Glory Combat Replacer
descriptionHtml:
*Check The Video Section for Previews!*

                             Intro
==============================================================================

I decided to make a few audio replacers of some of the songs I like, I may
also take requests in the future. for now here are a few I\'ve done:



           The Wings of Icarus Dragon Battle Replacer
==============================================================================

Replaces the default Skyrim Dragon Battle song with one of the greatest battle songs of all time:
\'Wings of Icarus\' from the Crysis Soundtrack.

Credits to the Composer of the song, I only encoded the song for your enjoyment
in the world of skyrim!



           Two Steps from Hell - To Glory Combat Battle Replacer
==============================================================================

Replaces the default Skyrim Combat Battle song with Two Steps from Hell - To Glory.




           Epic Skyrim Rap Main Menu Replacer
==============================================================================

Replaces the Skyrim Main Menu default song with the Epic rap made by Dan Bull!
Link to original song: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j50u0zUeCmU

Credits to the original author!


           Install
==============================================================================

Simply drag and drop into your Skyrim folder and overwrite. if your using any other custom songs make sure you back em up eh?



Uninstall
==============================================================================

if for some reason you dont like the files then just delete them from the Data Folder
author: FPSrad
